1.name: Apocalypse Now
1.description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

2.name: Alien
2.description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

3.name: Caligula
3.description: Details the graphic and shocking, yet undeniably tragic story of Rome's most infamous Caesar, Gaius Germanicus Caligula.

4.name: All That Jazz
4.description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid life of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

5.name: The Black Hole
5.description: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

6.name: Mad Max
6.description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

7.name: Being There
7.description: A simple, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

8.name: The Warriors
8.description: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

9.name: Stalker
9.description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

10.name: Life of Brian
10.description: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

11.name: Kramer vs. Kramer
11.description: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

12.name: The Jerk
12.description: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

13.name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
13.description: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

14.name: Rocky II
14.description: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

15.name: Meatballs
15.description: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

16.name: Moonraker
16.description: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

17.name: Escape from Alcatraz
17.description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

18.description: Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.

19.description: A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

20.name: Breaking Away
20.description: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

21.name: Hair
21.description: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

22.name: Manhattan
22.description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

23.name: ...and justice for all.
23.description: A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

24.name: Tess
24.description: A strong-willed young peasant girl attracts the affection of two men.

25.name: Nosferatu the Vampyre
25.description: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

26.name: The Amityville Horror
26.description: Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

27.name: Phantasm
27.description: A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber known only as the Tall Man, who keeps a lethal arsenal of terrible weapons with him.

28.name: The China Syndrome
28.description: A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.

29.name: Quadrophenia
29.description: Jimmy loathes his job and parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding and drugs, only to be disappointed.

30.name: Zombie
30.description: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

31.name: Rock 'n' Roll High School
31.description: A group of rock-music-loving students, with the help of the Ramones, take over their school to combat its newly installed oppressive administration.

32.name: The Brood
32.description: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

33.name: The Muppet Movie
33.description: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

34.name: The Wanderers
34.description: Set against the urban jungle of 1963 New York's gangland subculture, this coming of age teenage movie is set around the Italian gang the Wanderers. Slight comedy, slight High School angst ...                See full summary »

35.name: Beneath the Valley of the Ultra-Vixens
35.description: Believe it or not even in Smalltown USA there are still people who are unfulfilled and unrelieved in the midst of plenty. Levonna & Lamar could have the perfect relationship if it were not ...                See full summary »

36.name: Tourist Trap
36.description: A group of young friends stranded at a secluded roadside museum are stalked by a masked assailant who uses his telekenetic powers to control the attraction's mannequins.

37.name: Time After Time
37.description: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

38.name: Scum
38.description: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the 70's.

39.name: The Black Stallion
39.description: While traveling with his father, young Alec becomes fascinated by a mysterious Arabian stallion who is brought on board and stabled in the ship he is sailing on. When it tragically sinks ...                See full summary »

40.name: The Villain
40.description: Facing hanging, a bank robber makes a deal with the corrupt banker to avoid execution in exchange for a dirty assignment.

41.name: Hardcore
41.description: A conservative Midwest businessman ventures into the sordid underworld of pornography in California to look for his runaway teenage daughter who is making porno films in California's porno pits.

42.name: The Tin Drum
42.description: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

43.name: Norma Rae
43.description: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill despite the problems and dangers involved.

44.name: California Dreaming
44.description: Young T.T. comes from Chicago to spend the summer in California. He slowly becomes "California-ized," while learning about love and life in the Golden State.

45.name: The Rose
45.description: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.

46.name: Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro
46.description: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.

47.name: Dracula
47.description: In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

48.name: Laura, les ombres de l'été
48.description: Sculptor Paul meets a former great love again after a long time -- but is much more impressed by her 15-year-old daughter, Laura, who looks like her mother when Paul was in love with her. ...                See full summary »

49.name: Over the Edge
49.description: A group of bored teenagers rebel against authority in the community of New Granada after the death of one of their own.

50.name: More American Graffiti
50.description: College graduates deal with Vietnam and other issues of the late 1960s.
